content: I think I'll start by organizing my memories from each trip and then decide on a theme and design for my scrapbook or journal. For my NYC trip, I'll focus on the iconic landmarks and attractions, and include photos of the food I ate. For my California road trip, I'll organize my memories by location and include photos of the scenic drives and national parks. And for my Japan solo trip, I'll focus on the cultural experiences I had and write about the challenges and triumphs of traveling solo in a foreign country. Do you have any tips on how to write engaging captions or journal entries to accompany my photos and memorabilia?
